Package com.atakmap.android.drawing.tools

Class TelestrationTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.toolbar.Tool
      • com.atakmap.android.drawing.tools.TelestrationTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnKeyListener, Disposable
    public class TelestrationTool
extends Tool
    Modified from ShapeCreationTool

    Telestration provides the user with functionality to freehand mark on the map surface. Captures the touch and drag points of the user and on release draws a simplified polyline.
